Caption: The dignitaries in discussion during the high tea ceremony that was thrown in honour of Mr. Hans Lenzâ€™s (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) visit to IIT Madras
Description: Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras on 30th January, 1964. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. During the ceremony, Mr. Hans Lenz interacted with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members present. In the image, a few of the dignitaries converse over refreshments. The individuals identified in the image: Seated with his back to the camera is Prof. R. Krishnamoorthy (Humanities and Social Sciences). To his left is Dr. Nikolaus Klein (Professor of German) and to his right Prof. R. G. Narayanamurthy (HOD, Mechanical Engineering). To the right of Prof. Narayanamurthy is Dr. Scheer (Mechanical Engineering). The two other gentlemen seated at the table are yet to be identified.
